title: Pop Shop
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Plastic with woven black plastic handles
description: Orange, blue and green plastic bag with draw string. recto: In a green square an orange walking figue with upraised arms and blue star for head with Pop Shop spelled out in yellow.across bottom, Pop Shop 292 Lafayette St. NYC 219-2784. Verso:L Yellow star with green Pop Shop at center on pink with Haring's trademark figures and dogs around.
name: Shopping bag
